name: Maven Black-Briar

aspects.high_concept: Ruthless Matriarch of Riften's Criminal Empire
aspects.trouble: Everyone Is Either an Asset or a Threat

stunts: Web of Influence: +2 to Contacts when leveraging political or criminal connections in the Rift
Untouchable: Once per session, automatically avoid legal consequences for a crime through connections
Power Broker: May use Resources in place of Rapport or Deceive when dealing with nobles or officials
notes: Maven Black-Briar is the most powerful person in Riften, controlling both legitimate business (Black-Briar Meadery) and criminal enterprises through her connections to the Thieves Guild and Dark Brotherhood. She's calculating, ruthless, and utterly devoid of mercy for those who cross her. Maven sees everyone as tools to be used or threats to be eliminated. If the Imperials take Riften during the civil war, she becomes Jarl. Her influence extends far beyond the Rift.
combat_tactics: Maven never fights her own battles. She has bodyguards, the Thieves Guild, the Dark Brotherhood, and the law at her disposal. Cross her, and you'll face an army of consequences long before you see her again.
social_interaction: Maven is cold, direct, and intimidating. She speaks with absolute confidence and expects obedience. She makes no attempt to be likeable - she doesn't need to be. Every word is calculated, and she's always assessing how people can serve her interests. Cross her, and her tone becomes arctic.

relationships.Thieves Guild: Primary patron and beneficiary of guild operations
relationships.Dark Brotherhood: Has contract connections, can call in assassinations
relationships.Imperial Legion: Allied if Imperials take Riften, becomes Jarl

personality_notes.speaking_style: Cold, direct, commanding, makes statements not requests, threats veiled as facts
personality_notes.character_growth: Maven doesn't change - she's the immovable force in Riften politics. Others orbit around her power.

story_hooks: Patron of the Thieves Guild, expects loyalty and results
Can become Jarl of Riften if Imperials win civil war
Provides protection and resources to guild in exchange for services
May offer quests involving eliminating business rivals
Potential antagonist if player crosses her interests
Dark Brotherhood connection can lead to assassination contracts

dialogue_samples.greeting: You work for the guild, which means you work for me. Remember that.
dialogue_samples.business: I have interests that need protecting. The guild will handle it, and you'll ensure it's done correctly. Do I make myself clear?
dialogue_samples.threat: You should know that I have connections. Very powerful connections. Cross me, and you'll discover just how far they reach.
dialogue_samples.approval: Efficient. Professional. This is why the guild remains useful to me. Keep it up.
dialogue_samples.as_jarl: Jarl Maven Black-Briar. Has a nice ring to it, doesn't it? Now, the Rift will finally be run properly.

civil_war_notes.imperial_victory: Becomes Jarl of Riften, openly consolidates power
civil_war_notes.stormcloak_victory: Remains power behind throne, controls Jarl Laila
civil_war_notes.relationship_with_player: Depends on guild loyalty and whether player aids her ambitions
